product_name: Karbon Newton Soft-Shell Jacket - Men's - 2014 Overstock
long_description: Wear this versatile men's jacket on the slopes or for apres-ski adventures around town. The soft-shell fabric stretches and resists weather, while its bonded fleece lining adds light warmth.
